snippet: It can also be a piece of pie, or custard — so says a professor and author who spreads the magic of numbers through dessert recipes.
abstract: Dr Eugenia Cheng, theoretical mathematician working in rarefied field of category theory, is winning fame by imparting love of math to lay people; her book How to Bake Pi: An Edible Exploration of the Mathematics of Mathematics uses baked goods to explain mathematical concepts in simple terms.
lead_paragraph: It can also be a piece of pie, or custard — so says a professor and author who spreads the magic of numbers through dessert recipes.
